content: eat the rich quand le peuple n aura rien plus à manger il mangera le riche when the people have nothing left to eat they will eat the rich jean-jacques rousseau eat the rich beanie 2 yarn notes on construction fingering weight yarn in the following some knitters have reported that this pattern runs small quantities when worked with fingering weight yarn if you experience this problem you can try working with sport main colour natural 85m/93 yards weight yarn at the same gauge contrast colour red 85m/93 yards to avoid jogs uneven stripes at the beginning of the sample hat was knitted in rounds i use this jogless join method hillesvåg vilje 375m/100g and hillesvåg sølje 350m/100g because chart 2 is so wide it has been split into 3 parts when you get to these charts start with round 1 of chart the pompom used an additional 2a followed by round 1 of chart 2b and then round 1 of 42m/46 yards of the contrast colour chart 2c continue as established until you have completed round 33 of all charts see notes on construction regarding yarn weights on rnds 2 11 22 and 32 of chart 2b there are very long cc sections 32 sts rather than make floats over these sts i broke the mc and reattached it after needles knitting the cc 3 mm / us 2 5 circular needle 50 cm 3 mm / us 2 5 double-pointed hat needles with cc cast on 144 sts with circular needle place marker and join in a round work chart 1 around on gauge round 11 marked with ★ on the chart decrease 1 st = 143 sts 15 sts x 16 row = 5 cm/2 over chart 2a blocked then work chart 2 = 130 sts after round 31 then work chart 3 change to double-pointed needles finished measurements as necessary there should be 120 sts after round 1 96 height 8 5 /21cm sts after round 6 72 sts after round 13 48 sts after circumference 51cm/20 round 19 24 sts after round 23 12 sts after round 25 6 sts after round 26 the hat will fit a 56cm/22 head draw up rem sts abbreviations weave in ends block cc contrast colour if desired add a tassel or pompom k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together mc main colour links p purl rem remaining bernie sanders oligarchy exists right here in america round round timothy snyder of course it s a coup st s stitch es larry lessig we the people and the republic we must reclaim © lanja khon-engheim 2025 eat the rich beanie 3 / / 25 / mc 20 / cc no st 15 - p / / k2tog ★ ★ decrease 1 st on this round this decrease is not 10 - - 10 - - shown on the chart - - - - / - - 5 - - 5 - - - - - - / 1 - -
